SEARCH
Package teapot.rocket.components

Class Component

java.lang.Object
teapot.rocket.components.Component
All Implemented Interfaces:
Physical
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssemblyComponent, BodyComponent, Fin, InnerComponent
public abstract class Component extends Object implements Physical
The Component class is used for building rockets. It should be implemented as one of the following classes: 
 Component
         | -BodyComponent
         | -AssemblyComponent
         | -InnerComponent
 // TODO add OuterComponent as a separate class

The width, height, and weight represent the physical dimensions and mass of the component.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getWidth

      public double getWidth()
      Gets the width of the component.

      This method can be implemented by subclasses to calculate the width of specific component types, for example, considering also the width of the component children.

      Specified by:
